channel.title: [659] Unorthodox Gaming - Most advanced 562+ today! x100 hits and more
channel.description:
[center][img]http://unorthodoxgaming.zapto.org/website/images/ug.png[/img]
[font=arial black][size=14pt]Hate and trolls are not welcome in this thread[/size][/font], I will not reply anymore beacuse some trolls seem to think there allways right....
[size=14pt]We have been developing this server for over 2 and a half years from an old very glitch base, After lots of hard effort and trail and error's we now have developed it into a very stable server with lots of custom features. We have advertised it in the past under a different name. This time we are back! with a fresh appearance!![/size]
[size=18pt]Regular updates will be posted at our forums - [url=http://]Click here[/url][/size]
[size=18pt]Latest update: x100 combat system fully working[/size]
[size=25pt]Join this amazing server today![/size]
- Fully working x100 hits in both PVM/PVP
- Fully working Claw spec (Perfected)
- No known glitches with the new x100 system.
- Nex - Corp - Countless number of bosses~
- All armour and items in 659 cache has been addded with correct stats and gfx/Anim
- Decent drop rates
- Easy to make money
- Good Economy
- Great selection of items available in shops
- Lots of donator benefits from the pkshop/donatorshop
- Curses work in both pvp and pvm (Fully working) + Custom effects against bosses
- Lots of custom events and ways to receive items.
- Fully working makeover mage
- Custom Nex combat system
-1 Click combat (PVP/PVM)
-1 Click pickup
-Weekly updates with developers that can basically achieve anything. Where time is available.
-Lots of more positive content....
(This is not a leech)
[size=18pt](NOTE these screenshots where taken about 1 & half years ago...)[/size]
[img]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/3116/donations2.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/6151/adver2.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/3287/pic6xy.png[/img]
[img]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/8471/pic7h.png[/img]
[img]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/7222/pic3rf.png[/img]
[img]http://img803.imageshack.us/img803/7789/nex2o.png[/img]
[size=2em]For webclient please visit [url=http://unorthodoxgaming.zapto.org/webclients/Webclient659.php]Unorthodox 659[/url]
For our JAR Client please visit [url=http://unorthodoxgaming.zapto.org/webclients/UnorthodoxGaming659(JAR).jar]Unorthodox 659 - JAR Client[/url]
For our Client Package please visit [url=http://unorthodoxgaming.zapto.org/webclients/UnorthodoxGamingPackage.zip]Unorthodox 659 - Client Package[/url]
Visit our Website - [url=http://www.unorthodoxgaming.co.nr]Unorthodox Gaming[/url][/size]
[img]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/2594/unorthodoxteamsigniture.png[/img][/center]
